Jara Rascón, J

metadata.dc:description: Presentation of one case of gangrenous cystitis or vesical gangrene induced by the presence of a large vesical calculus in a patient with neurogenic bladder. Remarks on the patho-etiology, symptoms and treatment of this rare entity entailing a truly surgical emergence.
metadata.dc:title: Cistitis gangrenosa inducida por un cálculo vesical gigante.
[Gangrenous cystitis induced by giant bladder calculus].
